title: Blueprint, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Plumbing Plans", December 2, 1935
medium: Blueprint; double ruled border, on white wove paper
markings: Stamps: Stamp at lower right: see inscriptions and notes Plumbing Symbol stamp at center right
inscribed:
Inscribed in blueprint in stamp at lower right: PLUMBING PLANS/FOR/DONALD DESKEY/N.Y.C./R.W.L./T.N./1"=1'/12-2-35/[no.] 2810-DD; Inscribed in blueprint at lower right: 2 to Klinkuer [circled]; Inscribed in blueprint with dimensions and descriptions throughout.


Scale: 1"=1'0"
description: Blueprint of plumbing plans for Jascha Heifetz apartment, showing set up rack and sink on counter, and wrap-around back counter covering perimeter of room. Gated entry or door at lower right of room.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Plumbing Plans", December 2, 1935.
December 2, 1935. Blueprint; double ruled border, on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-263.
